author: Suwincha Singsuwan
description: POUR rum into glass and swirl to coat. POUR the rum from the glass into shaker and set glass aside. Add other ingredients to shaker, SHAKE with ice and fine strain into rum rinsed glass (no ice in glass).
name: Wind-up Bird Chronicle

recipeInstructions.text: POUR rum into glass and swirl to coat
POUR the rum from the glass into shaker and set glass aside
Add other ingredients to shaker, SHAKE with ice and fine strain into rum rinsed glass (no ice in glass)
